articles.title: Live Updates: Ukraine Is Withdrawing From Sievierodonetsk
articles.description: The ruined industrial city in eastern Ukraine fell after months of Russian bombardment and weeks of urban combat. Like Mariupol, it became emblematic of the savagery of the war.

articles.title: Ukraine's EU hopes get shot in the arm as bloc's leaders approve candidate status
